title: Focus on downers
creator_credit: American Educational Films and Noel Nosseck
brief_description: Vignettes illustrate how barbiturates can lead to death when they cause the user to forget how many they have taken, when they are taken with alcohol or when the user attempts to drive. Questions use by young people, and discusses barbiturate withdrawal.
